website_summaries.verdict: Four spatulas for a price that is lower than some single models with the added bonus of lifetime backing by the manufacturer. If you want an awesome deal, this is an unbeatable choice.
pros: This 4-piece set's lifetime guarantee, heat resistance up to 450 degrees, user-friendly sizes, and stylish colors make it a deal the competitors can't touch
Made of FDA-approved silicone that's also BPA-free
cons: Though some users found that their short handles provide good leverage, others found them awkward for many kitchen tasks
The small one isn't practical for many uses

customer_reviews.title: so it looks like I can't give details about the quality of this ...
customer_reviews.text: my original review was blocked, so it looks like I can't give details about the quality of this product. I will supply pictures and you can draw your own conclusions
customer_reviews.author: V. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable set
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these as a gift for my mother. She absolutely loved them and after I used them a few times at her house, I ended up ordering my own set! I have now bought a third set as a gift to a friend. I like that orange, purple, and blue ones have shorter handles. I have smaller hands and they are great for myself and my toddler when she helps bake. I haven't had any issues with them after a TON of use and going through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Krista.B

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality, but SMALL. Really look at the description, one is 11" but the others are all 8". I was surprised at the size, though they say in the description. These are fine quality and look like what I was looking for, but just be super aware of how small they are. They would be difficult to use in a mixer or a pot. If you have small applications, these would be good. Or perhaps for kids? The product pictures don't really show anything to give a scale context, though the fine print in the description does. Just know what you are getting!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart|Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Spatulas
customer_reviews.text: These have a metal piece inside so they're sturdy. The silicone is flawless, and feels well-made all around. My only complaint is that two of the spatulas are the same--just a different color (the purple and orange). It would have been nice to have another shape in there.
customer_reviews.author: SMRC

customer_reviews.title: Cute set of spatulas
customer_reviews.text: I think these spatulas are great. I knew they were on the small size after reading some reviews but I don't have a problem with it. I wanted some smaller spatulas and love that they are different colors and the smaller one is a kind of spoon. They are sturdy, heat resistant, and clean nicely in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: From Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Best Spatulas
customer_reviews.text: My sister is a baker and cake decorator and told me about these spatulas. My old ones were the kind that had two pieces and mold was getting to be an issue at times on the inside and they were so hard to clean. These spatulas, on the other hand, are fantastic! One piece, sturdy, easy to clean. They work great! And they last! I haven't had mine too long, but my sister has had hers for over a year and they are just as good as they were when she first bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Larson27

customer_reviews.title: Don't suffer any longer
customer_reviews.text: You'll want these. I love them. Why didn't I buy them sooner? The seem really high quality and more high quality than the old rubber ones that can melt in your food and break down and apart over time, always at the least opportunity moment of stirring something delicious that you don't have time or ingredients to remake.
customer_reviews.author: SLC 84102

customer_reviews.title: Really Useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after seeing them on sale. I didn't think I'd use them much but find myself grabbing one of these almost every day. They are made with nice quality. The set of different sizes is excellent for many various uses. Can't go wrong with a set of these.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer Head

customer_reviews.title: Good variety, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic spatulas (or scrapers) - I like the variety of sizes they come in and that they are very easy to clean. Even really sticky stuff comes off no problem. Partly because of the colors, they don't show stains, which is an improvement over the white ones I used to have. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Thorkildsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of one piece spatulas......
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for getting into jars and cans to get every last bit. Really like the solid one piece design. Great for using with baking jobs also scraping down mixer bowls etc.. Other spatulas I have had with the two piece handle and scraper start coming apart. I only wish Gloue made another set of all larger spatulas (I'll have to check) I use these all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and useful
customer_reviews.text: Love these spatulas! They are smaller than I expected - but I actually love the sizes and use them for all types of kitchen needs. I ordered sets for my daughter and daughter in laws homes as well. I keep a couple of the smaller spatulas on my vanity to use for getting the last remaining product out of nearly empty containers of lotions, creams, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jean H.

customer_reviews.title: this is so much better! So easy to clean being one piece with ...
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! These came across my lightening deals and I happened to need a replacement for a pampered Chef one...this is so much better! So easy to clean being one piece with no seams and works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I do so much baking from home, and I absolutely adore these spatulas. I use them almost daily, and they never let me down! I’d buy them again today! They do get some spots if you wash them in the dishwasher so I hand wash them, but that’s no big deal. I’ve had them for a few months and they’re still like new. Comfortable, functional, and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Avery basford

customer_reviews.title: I use these all the time, easy to clean : )
customer_reviews.text: Nice. I like that these do not have any crevices to accumulate crud. I have other silicon spatulas with wooden handles (I'd never buy spatulas with plastic handles...), and I have to take them apart to make sure I get them thoroughly cleaned so I must wash those by hand. These can be tossed into the dishwasher, but I usually wash them by hand anyway because I use them so often. They only take a few seconds to hand wash. Nice assortment of sizes and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: decemberistsFAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Soak first though.
customer_reviews.text: I love using these to cook with my nonstick cookware. The only issue is that they have a chemical after taste. Like when I was making batter and I licked it, I could clearly taste it-even after several washes. I soaked them over night. That helped some. Maybe that it might help others if you've noticed anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: LonaG

customer_reviews.title: Great value & more useful than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a whim during my Prime Day "adventure" and I quite like them. I didn't expect much for the price but was pleasantly surprised how much I've used them, esp the smaller ones. Perfect size for getting everything out of a jar or can and the bright colors make me happy when I open my drawer 😀
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: They all work as I would expect from good quality, flexible silicone
customer_reviews.text: Received early, used three of the four spatula's for various projects during the week. They all work as I would expect from good quality, flexible silicone; yet have nice rigid handles for applying pressure while scraping. The single piece style allows them to get completely clean, no handle fitting into a slot, where the slot could grab old food particles. (gag).
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten two sets. I really just wanted the spoon-like one but decided to get the whole set figuring I would probably not use the others. Was I wrong! Love them and they have replaced my favorite wooden spoon which I have been using for over 40 years! Love the one piece design as my old spatulas come apart. I am not sure which of the set is my favorite. Love the bright colors. Three are short, which is fine with me. Recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ccp

customer_reviews.title: seamless spatula
customer_reviews.text: seem to be well constructed. I will edit the review later if quality does not meet expectations after use. update from 2 weeks later: Though I wouldn't expect anything bad to happen this soon with these spatulas, they are still living up to the expectation. The wife loves them in comparison with the old farberware spatulas that she used to have. There is no place that food can get stuck since they are seamless. Update after 2 years: I still have all of these, and have even purchased another set. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: mattsdrumset

customer_reviews.title: Only Spatula's I've Been Using
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. Three of the spatula's have shorter handles which I find convenient for most uses (jars, small bowls). Nice soft and flexible. I've used them a lot since purchasing and still look great. I've had trouble with previous silicone spatula getting cut, probably from the food processor blade. So far the spatula's still look like new, I've both hand washed and used the dishwasher on them and used them while stovetop cooking even spaghetti sauce. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kekoa

customer_reviews.title: Colorful!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The colors are nice because when you find the size that works for a particular job, you can remember it by color. There is not a wide range of sizes (three are pretty close in size), but that is exactly what is advertised. I use them mostly on cold food, so cannot comment on how they hold up in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Love these spatulas
customer_reviews.text: First of all I did not get this product discounted. All I needed was the large red one and I would have paid full price just for that one. The other ones are really great for little jobs and probably save me money on peanut butter alone. My husband never scraped the jar clean until we got these!
customer_reviews.author: DotingAunt

customer_reviews.title: It's a gamble - bad quality control.
customer_reviews.text: In the process of returning. Quality control is very bad. The large one (red) was perfect. The other 3 are the smaller ones. In these cases the "spine" (metal I think) in the silicon was not contained in the proper position leaving either the spatula portion or handle limp like a noodle. In the case of the orange, the spine was so far past the thickened portion that it was visible and would if used punch through the spatula. It's too bad as it could have been a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: JustACustomer

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I swear this is a 4 pack but for some reason, I only have 2 in my box. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: leanne

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: They are mini spatulas. I bought this set for the blue spoon spatula and was expecting a larger item. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I'm returning them right away because I can't see what good they'll be for cooking
customer_reviews.text: These are not normal spatulas, they are TINY! I'm returning them right away because I can't see what good they'll be for cooking. They're better suited to a toy kitchen set.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of using plastic spoons for stirring eggs, etc. while cooking in non-stick pans in an effort to avoid scratching the teflon. These are working very well that and they clean up much easier than wood spoons/spatulas. The two small spatulas and spoon in the set are pretty small, but that's what I wanted. I haven't used the bigger spatula yet. Would be five-star rating if one of the small spatulas didn't have some small fuzzies on it when new.
customer_reviews.author: T. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Look for another set of spatulas.  Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived VERY dirty; each individually sleeve-covered spatula arrived covered in white grey, and brown/black-colored dirt, dust, and grit covered. What's more, they all smelled overwhelmingly bad. Even after airing out the spatulas the strong odor wouldn't dissipate. Did not feel comfortable using these spatulas to prepare foods for consumption (as a posed to staging for film or photography). Also, despite reading in the Q&A section of the product's page that this set is made in the US the product's box does not state where these spatulas are manufactured/produced. I've return these set of four GLOUE silicone spatulas. Look for another spatula set. Absolutely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Simple small spatula set
customer_reviews.text: Simple spatula set. These spatulas are as described by the seller. The price is fair and the colors are fun. The one piece design is great; no hidden places for bacteria to live and they're heat-resistant. The spatulas are small in size. I prefer a larger scoop-like spatula for mixing and scraping batter. Longer handles and skinnier spatula heads are best for scraping out jars. If this is going to be your only spatula set make sure the sizes are what you will use.
customer_reviews.author: Seasoned shopper

customer_reviews.title: Children sized utensils
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting adult sized spatulas, These are more suited for pre-teens and younger. Don't buy if your expecting full sized utensils. I'm really surprised at the overall rating of this product given the actual size of these. There is not a lot I will be able to use these for. I am going to return, They just are not functional for normal size work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr D

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my old silicone spatula with the removable head. Always had to remove the head to clean inside the socket. This one piece design is easier to clean. It has the right amount of flexibility for most situations. Three tiny versions are almost useless to me- I'll give two of them away. Colors serve no purpose; better to use a color that clearly shows when it needs cleaning. I seem to recall that it came in a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: swell

customer_reviews.title: Got to get used to them....
customer_reviews.text: They work really well. I use them with my Blue Diamond sets of pots and pans. Great for making eggs, hot cereals. The tips are a bit flimsy, but are designed that way. The rest of the utensil is sturdy and cleans well. I have 2 sets and think they are great. They are a bit short snd small so you have to get used to it. But, you do though. At first, I didn't use them, but then one day pulled one out not realizing what I had and it was great. Took a couple of uses, but now I am hooked on them!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch E.

customer_reviews.title: The unwanted logo makes them less attractive than they would be without it
customer_reviews.text: I am not into name brands, so I am clueless about the big bold and bearish name on each of these otherwise attractive kitchen tools. The small ones are smaller than most of my spatulas so it's a good thing they add variety but if I had lots less it would be frustrating because the larger ones are nice for stirfrying food, the three out of four smaller ones are not good for that. However, at the affordable price I paid, I realize I need to accept putting up with brazen advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Married Widow

customer_reviews.title: Scrape the bowl clean!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best spatulas I have ever used! They are lightweight yet extremely sturdy and scrape everything I need it to. These are also so easy to clean because there are no small crevices that food can hide. These spatulas are molded as one piece, hence no "handle" and "scraper". These are now may favorite kitchen spatulas and will never go back to regular spatulas again.
customer_reviews.author: Geek@heart

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: After opening these and flexing them back and forth the handle was already breaking through the spatula. I gave these to my kids for their play kitchen. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much I bought a second set!
customer_reviews.text: I use the small spatulas for everything from scraping a bowl to spreading mayonnaise. These are the first thing everyone in the house reaches for to spread anything! So I had to buy a second set! My only warning is watch out for knives near these it's very easy to nick the thin edges. My fault.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best spatulas I’ve ever had. Perfect balance between flexibility and rigidity. Blue one has slight spoon like quality perfect for scooping a little. The red one is a larger everyday size, the purple and orange perfect small size to fit a glass jar to stir sourdough starter.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but TINY!
customer_reviews.text: They are typical silicone spatulas, but be aware - they are tiny. I was in a hurry and just went by the photos, where the spatulas looked rather normal sized, compared to the other items in the photos. That was unfortunately not the case. I’m sure they will find a use, but they are not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: One piece construction means Easy clean & NO food  or food particles caught in crevices.
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised. Easy to clean. One piece solved problem of ends falling off in a bowl while using and prevents food particles from being left in small crevices. I particularly like the high temp it is safe for use. In the past I’ve had some that were hurt & useless after accidently being exposed to a high temp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One minor flaw IMO
customer_reviews.text: PRO; Colorful Functional Endure high heat well CON Slight discoloration after a few washes Tip of the spatula handles (non-working end) are too floppy as the internal metal does not travel all the way to the tip of the non-working end. This forces me to "choke up" on the spatula during cooking to improve my grip and mechanical advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Masterson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: A great deal. Better quality than the $10 single spatula from a local department store. One piece so no gaps to gather gunk, sturdy handles, good shape, and every size we need. Excellent bang for your buck with many important features for good spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Parker

customer_reviews.title: They work great! Buuuuuut mine only came with three instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great! Buuuuuut mine only came with three instead of four as advertised. This was kind of annoying because it didn't come with the blue one and that is the one that is shaped differently so it would have been a helpful tool. The ones I have work great but disappointed it didn't come with all as advertised. On a side note: the Amazon box I got also had what looked like some kind of used tool from the packing warehouse (or wherever Amazon packages are born) in it, it was a dirty looking yellow film slicer razor thing so I guess that's useful even if they didn't send me a blue spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Lucernoni

customer_reviews.title: Hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, silicone has held up well over time. My go-to spatulas for baking; but handles are too short to get that last bit out of quart jars (ie, mayonnaise)
customer_reviews.author: Kristine R.

customer_reviews.title: These feel very sturdy, but as another review pointed out
customer_reviews.text: These feel very sturdy, but as another review pointed out, they are definitely SMALL. The description has the measurements, but you don't realize how small they are until opening the box. My kids like to 'help' with coming so these will be good to let them use, but I probably will only use the larger one myself on a regular basis
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: My New babies
customer_reviews.text: They have become my ONLY kitchen tool. LOL so easy to clean and use on almost every dish. Eggs, meat, pasta, rice, jello, salads. I also use them to get all of the juices and sauces off the sides of my pans. I use them as a food squeegee and never waste a drop of anything anymore....BUY THEM..HURRY...you'll love them!!! I swear!
customer_reviews.author: amy b

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Even Better Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value set, super easy to clean, lovely to cook with, and the colors are quite nice too. Also very pleased to get a variety of 'shapes' which makes this a perfect all around spatula set at an excellent price point The only thing I would note is that they are smaller than I was expecting, but it's rather irrelevant as there is no compromise in function. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Wouln't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These haven't been used that much but they are chipping and breaking from being in the drawer. The red one is the only normal sized one. The other four are very small and not really worth usi8ng except in maybe a jar.
customer_reviews.author: Kym T.

customer_reviews.title: Already broken.
customer_reviews.text: Two of them are already broken after making Christmas cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great spatula set.
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I bought 2 sets. Very nice kitchen tool and you always need an extra good spatula in any busy kitchen. Love the nice bright color, soft and really works nicely cleaning out any bowl or dish. Would certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPATULA SET
customer_reviews.text: I bake all the time and was looking for extra spatulas at different sizes, this was the best spatula set I have ever bought! High quality. The spatula's are strong and easy to clean. I like the variety in the sizes because of what I use them for. I recommend for anyone's kitchen needs!
customer_reviews.author: OmgAshley

customer_reviews.title: Beware. A piece of the spatula fell off while ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware. A piece of the spatula fell off while washing it. Can you imagine if it fell of while I was using it to bake? And I only used it a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality spatulas
customer_reviews.text: Love these spatulas. The small ones are perfect for getting into jars. The blue spoon shaped one comes in very handy too. Glad I found a set of sturdy one piece silicone spatulas. They are excellent for non-stick pans but work great for any cooking situation. I would recommend these to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: TLW

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much.  Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I loves these spatulas/rubber scrapers WAY more than the ones I've previously had that contain 2 separate materials. I hate when my food gets stuck in the cracks that are joined together. They work well and I love that there are different sizes and angles on the ends of them. I'd buy more if I had more room in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Cam R

customer_reviews.title: Beware - these are mineature spatulas
customer_reviews.text: Why are these spatulas so much cheaper than others you're wondering? It's because they're tiny. The photoshopped images of the spatulas provided by the company either give no context to gague size or they provide misleading context to make them look bigger than they are. We're going to keep the set we bought because the build quality seems fine, they were super cheap, and they might be useful for scraping out small spaces like mini cupcake tins, but we're going back to buy a real full-sized spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best all silicone spatulas I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Love these spatulas! I got a set and liked them so much I bought another set for me and a set for 3 daughters. The handle section is not so heavy that they fall out of the pan like some, all silicone so you don't get germs between where some handles attach. I've been using then for about 2 years daily, still like new.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT JACQUES

customer_reviews.title: Love these spatulas.
customer_reviews.text: Love these spatulas. They scrape very well. My only improvement would be that the handles on the shorter spatulas could be an inch longer so as not to get your fingers mucky when you are scraping the bottom of a mayonnaise, peanut butter or jam jar. They can't be beat for the money.
customer_reviews.author: dlucas

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these and while they are flexible and easy to use, my box was half opened and one of the spatulas was missing. It seems like a lot of hassle to return these and the loose top is something that the manufacturer should be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Just what this kitchen needed!
customer_reviews.text: I am so tired of spatulas that fall apart when I am stirring something firm or sticky. LOVE that these are one piece. So far they seem to have a good amount of stiffness. Clean nicely. Variety of sizes for different jobs.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing and a huge improvement over the wooden handled silicon ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing and a huge improvement over the wooden handled silicon spatulas Ive had for years. The single piece construction makes cleaning a breeze and you dont have to worry about sanitation if you leave one soaking in the sink overnight as you would a wood handled utensil.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: The tips are very flimsy and not very useful with thicker batters or heavier stir fry items
customer_reviews.text: The tips are very flimsy and not very useful with thicker batters or heavier stir fry items. The purple one is the worst and useless. After a few uses, the metal punctured through and now it's really useless. I would not purchase again. There is a reason they are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: These spatulas are a quality product. They are sturdy and durable. I have washed them in the dishwasher and they held up well. The colors are fun too and since I’m using them with food coloring, I love these far better than my old white spatulas now!
customer_reviews.author: HWslp

customer_reviews.title: Different Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I like these quite a bit. I should have read the description better because I was under the impression that all four spatulas were the same size. They aren't but I actually like my smaller ones better after all.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan and Josephine H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but small
customer_reviews.text: People seem disappointed by the size, but I rather like the small size of these, as they do the same job, but they take up less space. However, if you need bigger spatulas, you may want to try something else. I personally love them. they're easy to clean, fit nicely in the dishwasher, and store easily. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They were fantastic at first but after a couple weeks I noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: They were fantastic at first but after a couple weeks I noticed that the metal center had started to protrude through the silicone and they are cut easily if you are scraping in a can. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: GWonder

customer_reviews.title: Yes, heat resistant and easy to clean, no to durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like they're easy to clean and heat resistant. I was disappointed at the size as only one of these was longer than an average butter knife. I'm also disappointed that after only three months I broke through the silicon mixing some dough.
customer_reviews.author: Tricky

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Omg I think I might want to get another set! These are the best spatulas I have ever used. Quality & durability & structure are AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Stylinforu

customer_reviews.title: More Baking = Automatic 5 Star Review
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed at the size of these then my 10 year old daughter came along and stopped them up. She loves them and they have encouraged her to bake with us. More baking = automatic 5 Star review
customer_reviews.author: Colm R. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: One piece spatula
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness and easy clean about this product. I had already purchased 2 of the smaller ones at our family dollar for a $1 each. I purchased this set for the long one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality At A Super Price
customer_reviews.text: I gave them as a gift, so the main features I saw were that they were study, in a very nice color spectrum & the price so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: LardareK

customer_reviews.title: Small but efffective
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the large red one, I didn't realize how small these were. I though about returning them but after giving them a chance, I kind of love them. The seems very sturdy while being flexible. They have no seams for crud to get caught, which is nice. They clean easily. They have become a kitchen staple.
customer_reviews.author: FryFam

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Chef approved!
customer_reviews.text: As a chef of over 15 years I have to say I am very happy with this product. I have used many in the past that either dont stan up to the heat or the handle just snaps. These are well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Darci Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They work exceptionally well and are quite flexible without being flimsy. I found them to be better than others I have had that were silicone with plastic handles. With these you have a great deal more control. Perfect for all kinds of kitchen use. Tempted to buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Euphist

customer_reviews.title: Silicone to the rescue.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about a year or so. Really like the fact they are one piece so they can go in the dishwasher. Bought extras as gifts for our children. Last year's Christmas gift was an enameled dutch oven. These will be part of this year's gift.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Laflin

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: #1 reason these are the best is that there are no crevasses for food crud to hide...less germs. #2 reason these are best is how nice they fit in my hand #3 reason these are the best is the fun colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect spatulas to be as nice or sturdy for the money I paid. I am pleasantly surprised. I would recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: CELESTIA

customer_reviews.title: Strange experience
customer_reviews.text: This was weird for me. I received the item but the box was torn, taped closed (dirty and worn). When I opened the box, small pieces of dry grass fell all over. The spatulas were fine and they'll just be washed. Just a strange experience all together.
customer_reviews.author: *3 J's momma

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice for the price. Very sturdy. My only real issue is that three of the four are pretty small, with the red one being the only one that was decent sized. I wish there had been at least two of the larger ones in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I prefer using a rubber spatula for everything I can in the kitchen but hate when the tops come off Problem solved with these! Theyre amazing, and the colors are super fun. Much easier to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they were just what I was looking for. They are smaller than the average spatula but that’s what I wanted. I always get a clean scrape with these.
customer_reviews.author: MamaR

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you buy good find
customer_reviews.text: Love these spatulas! Wish they had a set of just the big ones and they don’t melt I tested it willing to risk losing my money to see if it were true and it’s true! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Giselle V

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on these
customer_reviews.text: This set of four is a great deal (read 'steal'). They are everything I need in spatulas. I'm no expert, however.
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spatulas. I like one piece spatulas. I don't like a wooden stick with a rubber spatula on top, that is just making room for bacteria to grow between the wood and spatula head. These are a nice variety of shaped and sizes for all your needs.
customer_reviews.author: K. MICHEL

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description more closely. The 3 smaller spatulas are very small.
customer_reviews.author: PeterD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the sizes these come in
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as deal of the day. I LOVE them. The sizes are great and I use them all of the time. I have put them in the dishwasher MANY times and they have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 stars only because these seem to be very stiff, although that may just be my personal preference. Otherwise, they are user friendly and the colors stand out in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Gilroy

customer_reviews.title: These are great! No seams or handles attached separately for water ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! No seams or handles attached separately for water or food residue to settle in. Good sizes - perfect for scrambling eggs, stirring sautes. making sauces. Replaced two piece silicone spatulas with these - should have done it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: L. P. Inness

customer_reviews.title: I love these spatulas!
customer_reviews.text: These are great spatulas perfect for scraping out whatever pot, bowl, or dish you need to! They stand up pretty well the the heat so I haven't had to worry about them melting when i need to scrape out a hot pot. I will be buying more, because you can never have too many spatulas!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: RIDICULOUSLY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The spatulas are ridiculously small. One is usable, but the other three are so short that they can not be used during cooking for risk of burning hand. If they would have an image showing proportion vs. normal hand, I would never have bought them. Why not just make the proper size and then charge a bit more rather than producing wasteful products?
customer_reviews.author: Tannaz G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be good quality but smaller than expected. One of the 3 small ones is the only one with a scoop design.
customer_reviews.author: Kyote

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I really like these spatula's. I only wished I would have read the size description because they are a little smaller that I thought they would be but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: What a difference in these spatulas and the old kind I used to have. These are lightweight, easy to handle, and extremely easy to clean. I've had them about a year now and they look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: SJR

customer_reviews.title: Good Set of Smaller Silicone Spatulas
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it on a whim when it was on sale and glad I did. The smaller spatulas are not easy to find and this had three of them, which is why I purchased them. No keen on the large logo.
customer_reviews.author: DJB in Baton Rouge, LA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously small spatulas. They are well suited for a child
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Shinley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use them for getting the last bit of ingredients out of the beakers and they work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Zig Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and the colors!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a one piece spatula because it’s annoying when the handle separates on two pice versions. Found this set for a great price and I’m so glad I did. There’s good flex in the top and the stiff handle is perfect. The colors are lovely and make me smile. Hey, it’s the little things in life, right? :)
customer_reviews.author: lawaters

customer_reviews.title: Great spatulas!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Bright colors; sturdy; one-piece design makes it easy to clean! Scrapes edges of bowl so there is no waste. A great addition to my kitchen tools!
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These get some kinda white film on them if they go through the dishwasher so I opt to wash them by hand. Good quality and durable. Like the shape and size variety.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Just the right sizes for everything and the blades dont seperate from the handles so prohibits contamination and mold growth.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Tiny like a teaspoon
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use them but initial impression is "wow, those are TINY!" Picture is shown next to standard teaspoon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: While I love the fact that they are heat resistant and can ...
customer_reviews.text: While I love the fact that they are heat resistant and can go in the dishwasher- they are kind of flimsy when stirring a stiff batter- additionally, the eyelet on the small purple spatula was broken
customer_reviews.author: Thad Jones

product_meta.title: GLOUE 450oF Heat-Resistant Baking Spoon & Spatulas - Ergonomic Easy-to-Clean Seamless One-Piece Design - Nonstick - Dishwasher Safe - Solid Stainless Steel-Multicolor
feature_bullets: HIGH HEAT 450°F PRO-GRADE SILICONE - Our spatulas made from high quality, flexible, non-sticking and heat-resistant silicone It is Safe for Coated & Non-stick Cookware and perfect for use with hot foods and around the cook top.

DURABILITY - This is key. Stainless Steel is added to every spatula for extra strength ensuring your set will work perfectly on the first use and the 100th use.You need a spatula set that you can count on day in and day out!
EASY TO USE AND CLEAN: They will not melt, warp, discolor, or shrink like regular plastic or wooden brushes. Each high-quality spatula is dishwasher safe or can be easily cleaned by hand.
3D SHAPE DESIGN - Ergonomic design for confortable grip - Perfect weight and balance - Easy-to-use - One Piece design means no head to pop off and easy to clean.
VERSATILE SET - The large spatula allows for bigger jobs, while the small one can be used for smaller pots and pans. Our spatulas lets you do all the scrubbing and flipping.Red+Orange+Purple+Blue

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,899 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
